title: Stay Calm
description: Your pet can sense your emotions. Remaining calm will help keep them calm and allow you to think clearly.

title: Ensure Safety
description: Make sure the environment is safe for both you and your pet. Remove any immediate dangers.

title: Assess the Situation
description: Quickly evaluate your pet's condition. Check for breathing, consciousness, and visible injuries.

title: Contact Emergency Services
description: Call your emergency veterinary service immediately. Provide clear information about your location and your pet's condition.

title: Provide Basic First Aid
description: If trained, provide basic first aid while waiting for professional help. Do not attempt complex procedures.

title: Transport Safely
description: Move your pet carefully to avoid further injury. Use a carrier or blanket as a stretcher if necessary.
